$description: Dark theme shadow tokens. References dark theme shadow primitives for consistent elevation with higher opacity for visibility on dark backgrounds.

xs.$description: Extra small shadow (dark theme) - minimal elevation. Use for: subtle depth on cards at rest, input fields.

sm.$description: Small shadow (dark theme) - low elevation. Use for: card hover states, raised buttons.

md.$description: Medium shadow (dark theme) - moderate elevation. Use for: dropdown menus, popovers, tooltips.

lg.$description: Large shadow (dark theme) - high elevation. Use for: dialogs, modals, drawers.

xl.$description: Extra large shadow (dark theme) - maximum elevation. Use for: critical modals, full-screen overlays.

footer.$description: Footer shadow (dark theme) - upward-casting. Use for: sticky footers, bottom navigation bars.
